alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 13 at 2:47AM PST until February 15 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees possible, coldest away from the coast. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Ventura County Inland Coast, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
